name: Music_4813.wav
keywords: ['drum solo', 'cowbell accent', 'moderate tempo', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instruction music', 'instrumental']
caption: This song is a drum solo. The hi-hat is played in eighths on the one, two and four counts of the bar. This drum is playing a syncopated rhythm. On the third count, the snare is played. The cowbell is played five times in 2 bars of eight counts. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This song can be played as an instruction for syncopated drumming patterns.
